data.description:
***NEW VERSION***

Studio Clock is a premium watchface that has undergone major enhancements in the areas of performance, battery life, usability and includes many new features.

To see what's new, please click on the "What's new" option within the Studio Clock Configuration Screen within the Pebble Time Application on your phone.

Studio Clock is Pebble Watchface inspired by a clock used in Studios. The watchface includes the following features, all of which can be disabled / enabled as you please:

-- New  & Easier to use Configuration Screen
-- Fully customizable colors. You choose what you like!
-- Choose from 5 different styles for seconds display
-- Glancing, seconds stop ticking after a selected amount of time (10 seconds by default)
-- Battery Level Indicator
-- Left-handed Rotation
-- Weather based on your current location provided by Openweathermap.com
-- Bluetooth disconnection icon and vibration
-- Hourly Vibration
-- Select from 11 languages for the day or display the current week number.
-- Choose the date format which makes sense to you
-- Displays your Steps for the day against your target amount.
-- Blanks the Pebble Screen after 5 minutes of no movement (hourly vibrations are also disabled)
-- All configuration done on your phone through the Pebble Time App.

Purchasing Studio Clock is optional, however configuration options are only available to licensed users. By purchasing a license you are supporting me the developer and allowing me to include more functionality and improve the product.

One time cost: $1.49 + EU taxes if applicable
